titleStmt.title: Tarugo's wiles, or, The coffee-house a comedy : as it was acted at His Highness's the Duke of York's Theater / written by Tho. St Serfe.
titleStmt.author: St. Serfe, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1668.

notesStmt.note: Based on Moreto's play No puede ser.
